property.name: hive.server2.authentication
property.description: Expects one of [nosasl, none, ldap, kerberos, pam, custom]. Client authentication types. NONE: no authentication check LDAP: LDAP/AD based authentication KERBEROS: Kerberos/GSSAPI authentication CUSTOM: Custom authentication provider (Use with property hive.server2.custom.authentication.class) PAM: Pluggable authentication module NOSASL: Raw transport
